GK16visa06cu:2671: (vi, ya) sandhiṣu yānyaṅgānyuktāni teṣu katicit aṅgānyeva āvaśyakatvena pradhānānīti kecidāhuḥ /

GK16visa06cu:2691: aniyate sandhavapi tasyāṅgasya niveśanaṃ kuryyāt ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2712: prakāśyānāmarthānāṃ prakāśanañceti prayogasya mukhasandhyādiprayogasya aṅgānāmupakṣepādyaṅgānāṃ ṣaṭ phalānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2713: yathā kāvyārthetpattirūpasya upakṣeparūpasya mukhasandhyaṅgasya iṣṭānusaraṇaṃ phalam /
GK16visa06cu:2716: (lo, ī) yadvastu gopayitumiṣṭaṃ tadaṅgasvarūpavijñāpanena sukhena gopayitu evaṃ prakāśyānāṃ prakāśaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2719: aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogāya yujyate // VisSd_6.118 //
GK16visa06cu:2731: atra ca tatsambandhāt nāyakasahāya eva tattvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2741: (vi, śa) upakṣepādyaṅgatrayasya ca pradhānanāyaketareṇa samuddiṣṭatve eva sādhutā ityāha--kintūpakṣepeti /
GK16visa06cu:2744: pradhānapuruṣasya dhīrodāttatvena karttavyetivṛttabījasamuddeśasya alpasyāpi tena karaṇānaucityād iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2745: tathā hi kāvyārthasya samutpattirūpaṃ yadupakṣeparūpamaṅgaṃ tena veṇyāṃ lākṣāgṛhānaletyādi bhīmoktyā kurukulavadharūpakāvyārthasya tasya bījasamutpattiḥ pratipāditā /
GK16visa06cu:2753: bījoddeśamātrādeva nāyakasya dhīrodāttatvabhaṅga ityatra eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa06cu:2757: tathā ca yadveṇyāṃ duryodhanasya bhānumatyā saha vipralambho darśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:2764: kintu rasavyañjanāpekṣayā eva eṣāṃ niveśanaṃ na tu nāṭyasāstroktasthitisampādanecchayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2765: yadyapīdaṃ prāgapyuktaṃ tathāpi rasavyaktyanapekṣayā karaṇe doṣa tvapratipādanāya purarūktam /
GK16visa06cu:2779: svasyopakrāntavṛttasya viruddhamadhikaṃ yad vṛttaṃ vṛttāntaḥ tadapi rasābhivyaktaye 'nyathayedupakrāntarasāviruddhatayā pratipādayet /
GK16visa06cu:2784: rase raudre ca bībhatse vṛttiḥ sarvatra bhāratī // VisSd_6.122 //
GK16visa06cu:2791: nāyakādīnāṃ vyāpāraviśeṣāścatastro vṛttayo nāṭakādiṣu nāṭakaprakaraṇādidaśarūpakeṣu nāṭikādyaṣṭādaśoparūpakeṣu ca sarvanāṭyasya mātṛkā mūlabhūtāḥ jananya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2802: (lo, u) kāmena madanena hetunā ya upabhogaḥ sambhogastatkāraṇāni upacārāścandracandanaghanasārādayo yasyām /
GK16visa06cu:2827: śuddhena saśṛṅgāreṇa samayena ca hāsyena vihitamiti traividhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2831: esā vi avarā tava samīve jadhālihidā edaṃ kiṃ ajjavasantassa viṇṇāṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2835: eṣāpyaparā tava samīpe yā ālikhitā etat kimāryavasantakasya vijñānam ? (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2836: citraphalake sāgarikayā likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṅgatayā tatsamīpe sāgarikāpi likhitā /
GK16visa06cu:2837: tatra likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattayā pṛṣṭaṃ kena tvamatra likhitā iti /
GK16visa06cu:2839: tatastadantike sāgarikāṃ likhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā “eṣā krodhena tasyāḥ śṛṅgārābhāvāt /
GK16visa06cu:2842: saśṛṅgārahāsyena yathā śākuntale--rājānaṃ prati śakuntalā--asaṃtuṭṭho uṇa kiṃ karissadi /
GK16visa06cu:2851: nanu kamalasya madhukaraḥ santuṣyati gandhamātreṇa iti rājña uktyanantaraṃ śakuntalāyā iyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa06cu:2855: sabhayahāsyena yathā ratnāvalyām---ālekhyadarśanāvasare susaṃgatā--jāṇido mae eso vuttanto samaṃ cittaphalaeṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2864: atra rājño bhītiyuktena susaṅgatāyā hāsena vihitaṃ narma vaidaghdhyakrīḍitam /
GK16visa06cu:2870: tatra sāgarikāyāḥ saṅketabhaṅgārthaṃ tadveśāyā vāsavadattāyā āgamane veśena bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2879: devīe bhaeṇa appaṇo vi pia kauṃ ṇa pāremi” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2889: nanu bhościrāt praṇayonmukhe mayi atimuktalatāyāḥ mādhavīlatāyāścaritaṃ gṛhāṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2896: devyāḥ bhayena ātmano 'pi priyaṃ karttuṃ na pārayāmi (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2903: gamanamalasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kintvetat syāt kimadanyadito 'thavā /
GK16visa06cu:2904: bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām //
GK16visa06cu:2917: atrottarottarādhikādhikasambhāvanāyāṃ pūrvoktaiḥ sūcitasya bhāvasya leśa evetyāha---alasetyādi /
GK16visa06cu:2931: pitrā rājājñayā jarate nandanāya dātuṃ kṛtaniścayā mālatīti devatagṛhe svamaraṇaṃ prārthayantī lavaṅgikāyāḥ pāde patitā mālatī /
GK16visa06cu:2932: stambhantaritasthito mādhavaśca lavaṅgikāveśena āgatya lavaṅgikām apasārya tatsthāne svapādaṃ dattvā sthitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2933: tato mālatī utthāyā lavaṅgikābuddhyā tamāliṅgya paścād dṛṣṭvā paricīyamānā vyavasāyat nivavṛte ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2943: sattvādibhiḥ samastavyastālpatarair bahulā tadvaiśiṣṭyāt bāhulyavatī harṣādyanyatarayuktā vṛttiśca sāttvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2946: atra kṣudraśṛṅgāratvena strīsaṃkulatvakāmopabogarāhityena vīrarasatvena kauśikīto viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2955: ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo 'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyantu mamāpi samprati kutastvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2956: tvatsāṅgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastat kiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛtaiḥ ?
GK16visa06cu:2960: (vi, ṭha) ānandāya ceti---paraśurāmāgame rāmaṃ prati janakasya vākyamidam /
GK16visa06cu:2964: ato 'dya tvaddarśane samprati etat kṣaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ kuto vaitṛṣṇayam /
GK16visa06cu:2965: utkaṇṭhābāhulyāt kṣaṇāntare 'niṣṭanivṛttau tu utkaṇṭhānivṛttyā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ syāditi samprati padabhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2968: ato 'smin viṃsmṛtasya jāmadagnyasya vijayanimittaṃ tava bāhau dhanurjṛmbhatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2970: atra vismayavaśād rāmaśauryyeṇānandādinā ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2973: mantraśaktyā yathā---mudrārākṣase rākṣasasāyānāṃ cāṇakyena svabuddhyā bhedanam /
GK16visa06cu:2979: mantrasya mantraṇārthasya dhanasya daivasyādṛṣṭasya vā śakteḥ śaktihetoḥ saṃghasya sainyasamūhasya bhedanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2983: atra cāṇakyasya sattvadānānekasattvaṃ saṃghabhedanavaśād vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2987: yaḥ kila saparivārakārttikeyavijayāvajītena bhagavatā nīlalohite parivatsarasahastrāntevāsine tubhyaṃ prasādīkṛtaḥ paraśuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2996: atra kautukeneva vijayo na tu vāstava iti tatpitṛprasādagamyam /
GK16visa06cu:2997: tathāparaprasādalabdhena paraśunā ko 'yaṃ garva iti rāmasya gabhīrātmikā uktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2998: paraśurāmoktau tatpriyavastvapi mahyaṃ dattamiti svamahattvakhyāpanameva gabhīratā /
GK16visa06cu:3029: jīyante jayino 'pi sāndratimiravrātairviyadvyāpibhir- bhāsvantaḥ sakalā raverapi karāḥ kasmādakasmādamī /
GK16visa06cu:3037: raverapi amī bhāsvantaḥ sakalāḥ karāḥ akasmādakāle kasmādacchādyante /
GK16visa06cu:3039: ānanarūpābhyaḥ kandarābhyo 'nalamuca ete pheravāḥ śṛgālāśca tīvrān ravān muñcantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3050: kruddhau ca tau satvarau ceti karmadhārayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3063: neturnṛtyapātrasya ekasya nivṛttau netrantarasya graha eva saṃkṣiptavasturacanā /
GK16visa06cu:3072: eva sugrīvakilañjahastinoḥ pūrvaṃ raudro raso bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3098: aśrāvya khalu yadvastu tadiha svagataṃ matam // VisSd_6.137 //
GK16visa06cu:3100: rahasyaṃ tu yadanyasya parāvṛtya prakāśyate // VisSd_6.138 //
GK16visa06cu:3111: tādṛśena kareṇānyamapavāryyācchādya janasyānte antike yat anyonyāmantraṇaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa06cu:3114: kiṃ vravīṣīti yannāṭye vinā pātraṃ prayujyate /
GK16visa06cu:3116: yaḥ kaścidartho yasmādropanīyastasyāntarata ūrdhvaṃ sarvāṅgulināmitānāmikaṃ tripatākalakṣaṇaṃ karaṃ kṛtvānyena saha yanmantryate tajjanāntikam /
GK16visa06cu:3130: dattāṃ siddhāṃ ca senāṃ ca veśyānāṃ nāma darśayet /
GK16visa06cu:3136: vasantādiṣu varṇanīyasya vastuno yannāma bhavet ceṭaceṭyostathā nāma ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3146: nāṭake garbhitaḥ pratipādyo yor'thastatprakāśakaṃ nāṭakasya nāma kāryyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3162: (vi, ra) nāṭikādīnyaṣṭādaśoparūpakāṇi yānyuktani teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma kābhirnāyikānāmnaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3172: tadantaḥ sādhadhātuḥ gameḥ sthāne prāyeṇa prayujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3176: rājā svamīti deveti bhṛtyairbhaṭṭeti cādhamaiḥ // VisSd_6.144 //
GK16visa06cu:3193: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājannati apatyapratyayena ca vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3198: vayasyetyathavā nāmnā vācyo rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.146 //
GK16visa06cu:3211: sūtradhāraṃ vadedbhāva iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //
GK16visa06cu:3227: devarṣayo liṅginaḥ parivrājakāśca sarvaireva bhagavanniti vācyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3229: vadedrājñīṃ ca ceṭīṃ ca bhavatīti vidūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.149 //
GK16visa06cu:3230: āyuṣman rathinaṃ sūto vṛddhaṃ tāteti cetaraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3233: (vi, ka) rathinaṃ vṛddhasūta āyuṣmanniti itarastu tāteti vadedityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3235: vatsaputrakatāteti nāmnā gotreṇa vā sutaḥ // VisSd_6.150 //
GK16visa06cu:3248: sādho / iti tapasvī ca praśāntaścocyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3264: vācyā prakṛtibhī rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛdārikā // VisSd_6.154 //
GK16visa06cu:3269: jyeṣṭha uttamastathā cottamamadhyamādhamaiḥ svastriyaḥ strībhiḥ patiryathā tathā vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3270: tathā cāryyaputreti patyurucyamānatvāt āryyaiti patyā striyo vācyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3298: yasya yatkarma śilpaṃ vā vidyā vā jātireva vā // VisSd_6.157 //
GK16visa06cu:3309: śaurasenyādayo bahvyo bhāṣāḥ prākṛtaviśeṣāḥ prākṛtavṛttau anusandheyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3311: āsāmeva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīṃ prayojayet // VisSd_6.159 //
GK16visa06cu:3379: atra nāṭakalakṣaṇāni sakalāni ṣaṭtriṃśaddharmāṇi prayojyāni ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3390: nidarśanābhiprāyau ca prāptirvicāra eva ca // VisSd_6.172 //
GK16visa06cu:3394: pṛcchā prasiddhiḥ sārūpyaṃ saṃkṣepo guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.174 //
GK16visa06cu:3408: (vi, da) atra bhūṣaṇasaṃjñakasya lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇamāha--tatra guṇairiti /
GK16visa06cu:3412: koṣaḥ kuṅbhavā evā ko ṣo dhanam /
GK16visa06cu:3438: siddhairupamānabhūtairarthaiḥ samamekavākyenaiva aprasiddha upameyabhūtor'tho vidheyānvayārthaṃ prakāśate /
GK16visa06cu:3444: kāmaṃ dhanuriva krūro varjanīyaḥ satāṃ prabhuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3448: dhanuriva krūraḥ prabhuḥ kāma yatheṣṭaṃ satāṃ varjanīyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3453: koṭi koṭisaṃkhyakaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti tathākoṭyādyatiguṇo jyā śauryādiśca /
GK16visa06cu:3454: atra siddhena dhanuṣā samaṃ prasiddhaḥ krūraḥ prabhuḥ vidheyavarjanānvayārthaṃ prakāśyate /
GK16visa06cu:3469: prakrāntārthatulyāvabodhakena vākyena prakrāntārthasyātiśayitvapradarśanāt abhimato 'tiśayitatvarūpor'thaḥ sādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3472: anuyāntyā janātītaṃ kāntaṃ sādhu tvayā kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:3473: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā //
GK16visa06cu:3483: atra vākyabhedāt upamānopameyayoḥ samaṃ prakāśanābhāvāt śleṣābhāvācca pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3493: yathā veṇyāṃ bhīmaṃ prati “ceṭī--evaṃ mae bhaṇidaṃ bhāṇumadi tuhmāṇaṃ amukkesu kesesu kahaṃ devīe kesā saṃjamiantitti /
GK16visa06cu:3498: bhānumati / yuṣmākamamukteṣu keśahasteṣu kathaṃ devyāḥ keśāḥ saṃyamyante iti” (saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:3499_0: atra draupadyāḥ keśāsaṃyamanahetau bhānumatyā pṛṣṭe sabhrātṛkaduryodhanavadhābhāve
GK16visa06cu:3499_1: hetau pradarśayitavye vaidhavyacihnasya bhānumatyāḥ keśamocanasya abhāvo hetuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa pradarśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:3505: kiṃ cāsya viṣayasyaiva devatā kimu pārvatī //
GK16visa06cu:3509: ajñātatattvasya janasya vākye śṛṇvatā yadaniścayaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3520: ucitamevaitattasyā yato duryodhanakalatraṃ hi sā” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:3526: atra draupadyā upanyastasya bhānumatyā daurjanyasya duryodhanakalatratvaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3530: prayeṇaiva hi dṛśyante kāmaṃ svapnāḥ śubhāśubhāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3538: nakulenāhiśataṃ hatvā bhānumatyāḥ stane kṣata iti bhānumatyā dṛṣṭe svapre kathite duryodhanasyeyamāśaṅkā /
GK16visa06cu:3540: saṃcayor'thānurūpo yaḥ padānāṃ sa padoccayaḥ // VisSd_6.180 //
GK16visa06cu:3549: padānāṃ sañcayaḥ samūho yor'thānurūpaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3552: artho yathā komalastathā śabdoccayo 'pi kaṭuvarṇavirahāt komala ityāha---atra padapadārthayoriti /
GK16visa06cu:3557: kiṃ tu bālini rāmeṇa mukto bāṇaḥ parāṅmukhe //
GK16visa06cu:3562: atrādharmayuddhena śatrumāraṇārthaṃ prasiddhasya rāmeṇānyāyena vālivadhasya nidarśanam /
GK16visa06cu:3566: idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klamaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
GK16visa06cu:3575: avyājamanoharam akṛtrimaramyaṃ vapuḥ yaḥ ṛṣiḥ kaṇvaḥ tapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitumicchati /
GK16visa06cu:3581: yathā mama prabhāvatyām--“anena khalu sarvataścaratā cañcarīkeṇāvaśyaṃ viditā bhaviṣyati priyatamā me prabhāvatī” /
GK16visa06cu:3610: āryye tvayibhīme jyotiḥ krodhajanitaṃ svatejaḥ sambhṛtamāviṣkṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:3620: bharturviprakṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3629: viprakṛtā tiraskṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā bharttuḥ pratīpaṃ mā sma gamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3631: vāmā upadiṣṭe tad viparītakāriṇyaḥ kulasyādhayo manasaḥ vyathākāriṇyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3638: jai saṃharijjai tamo dheppai saalehi te pāo /
GK16visa06cu:3639: vasasi sire pasubaiṇo tahavi ha itthīa jīaṇaṃ harasi //
GK16visa06cu:3645: tathā ca svaniṣṭhaguṇānāṃ virodhi yat svakāryyaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3647: tvayā saṃhriyate tamo gṛhyate sakalaistava pādaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3648: vasasi śirasi paśupatestathāpi strīṇāṃ jīvanaṃ harasi //
GK16visa06cu:3661: asāmānyasya anyāvṛtterguṇasāya yo nirdiśyamāne vastuni udreka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3665: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhi / te //
GK16visa06cu:3672: yadvā te tubhyaṃ tava sthāne vā kutaḥ prāptaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3674: antarmadhye cañcat cañcalaṃ vikacanavanīlotpalayugalaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3676: tathā tale 'dhobhāge sphūrjat dīpyamānaḥ kambuḥ rekhātrayaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3679: tathā upari vilasan alisaṅghāto yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3681: tathā doṣārātrerāsaṅga eva doṣāṇāmāsaṅgastaṃ vinā satatameva paripūrṇākhilakalo vigalitakalaṅkaśca /

GK16visa06cu:4754: mayā virahitā sarvāṅgasundarī rāmā urvaśī ramye 'smin vanānte tvayā dṛṣṭā iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4755: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā ityāhatvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭeti pratiśabdārthasya yojanāddarśanottaraṇaśabdayorekārthatve 'pi darśitarītyā praśrottarabhāvena yojanādanekārthatā,
GK16visa06cu:4763: atra rājñāṃ prathamārthābhiprāyeṇa praśrarūpārthaṃ vākyamidamuktvā parvate pratidhvanimākarṇya dvitīyārthaḥ parvatasyottaratvenāvagato virahonmādāta /
GK16visa06cu:4769: kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ kvā'ste duryodhano 'sau kathayata,
GK16visa06cu:4777: dyūtacchalādikarttṛtvaviśiṣṭo yastaṃ draṣṭumāgatau svaḥ na tu ruṣā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4781: atra draṣṭumeva na ruṣeti priyābhena vākyena pratārya upahasanam /
GK16visa06cu:4798: kiṃ tena madyaṃ vinā madyaṃ cāpi tava priyaṃ priyamaho vārāṅganābhiḥ saha /
GK16visa06cu:4799: veśyāpyartharuciḥ kutastava dhanaṃ dyūtena cauryeṇa vā cauryadyūtaparigraho 'pi bhavato,
GK16visa06cu:4804: parihāsāya māṃsaṃ bhakṣantaṃ bhikṣuṃ prati bhikṣo ityādirgṛhiṇaḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4834: adya mama pracaṇḍe bhujadaṇḍe samarpito ya uruḥ kodaṇḍastato nirgalitānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ bāṇaānāṃ samūhasya (sahastrasya vā pāṭhabhedāt )
GK16visa06cu:4835: pātairiyaṃ kṣauṇī kṣaṇena samastadaityakṣatajaiḥ ukṣitā satī piśitāśanānāṃ lobhanīya āstāmityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4837: gaṇḍaṃ prastutasaṃbandhi bhinnārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.260 //
GK16visa06cu:4848: satvareṇoktatvāt satvaraṃ bhinnārthaṃ vaco yat prastutasya prakrāntasya varṇanaṃ tat sambandhitayā pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4865: ṇa kkhu tumhāṇaṃ saalāe jjeva puhavīetti /
GK16visa06cu:4869: svarasoktasya vaktṛbhāvena utkasya śroturasvarasāt yadanyathā vyākhyānaṃ tadavasyanditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4872: tatra sa rājā vinayena praṇamitavyaḥ (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4874: jātaḥ sa khalu yuvayoḥ pitā (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4879: na khalu yuvayoḥ kiṃ tu sakalāyā eva pṛthivyā iti (iti saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:4881: atrapiteti janakaparatayā sītayā svarasoktasya labdhāvasyandanāt tayā eva pālakatayā vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4883: prahelikaiva hāsyena yuktā bhavati nālikā // VisSd_6.261 //
GK16visa06cu:4885: yathā ratnāvalyām---susaṅgatā---sahi jassa kide tumaṃ āadā so ida jjeva ciṭṭhadi /
GK16visa06cu:4886: sāgarikā--kassa kide ahaṃ āadā susaṅgatā--ṇaṃ kkhu cittaphalaassa /
GK16visa06cu:4887: atra tvaṃ rājñaḥ kṛte āgatetyarthaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4891: saṃvaraṇakārīti vyākhyānarūpāṅge 'pi saṃvaraṇarūpasya sattve 'pyatra hāsyayuktatvaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4892: sahi jasseti---sakhi yasya kṛte tvamāgatā so 'traiva tiṣṭhatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4899: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yacca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //
GK16visa06cu:4925: atra ca āhāryāropābhāvāt na rūpakaṃ kintu vāstavabhramāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa06cu:4927: tatra yathā mama-- dvijaḥ śākhāyuktastvayi kṛtakathaḥ kokila iti tvayākhyeyaṃ mande mayi virahipāte kiyadagham /
GK16visa06cu:4928: iti praśre vāyormukulapulakā cūtalatikā dhruvaṃ dhṛtvā mauliṃ na khalu kiyadityuttarayati //
GK16visa06cu:4929: atra hi vātadhūtamaulikāyāṃ cūtalatikāyāṃ mandavayoḥ kati māpapraśre maulipūnanena pāpabhāvottarāropaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4933: kokila eva drupadāmantrasya ṛṣiḥ kokilanāma vedaśākhāyukto dvijaḥ sa tvayi kṛtakatha ityatastvayā mande vedarahite idamapyākhyeyam /
GK16visa06cu:4937: tṛtīyaṃ yathā veṇyāṃ duryodhanaṃ prati gāndhāryā hitavākyam /
GK16visa06cu:4938: athavā pradīyatāṃ dāśarathaye maithilīti rāvaṇaṃ prati vibhīṣaṇasya vākyamidamapi bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:4949: ityādinā nāyakasya viśuddhanāyikādarśanaprayuktena hāsalobhakāriṇa vacasā vyāhāraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4959: prathamaṃ brāhmaṇapūjā bhavati sā anayā laṅghitā /
GK16visa06cu:4961: atra parasya lājño lābhārthaṃ hāsyakaraṃ vidūṣakasya vākyamāha--
GK16visa06cu:4963: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syurmṛdar(mādaṃ)
GK16visa06cu:4970: etāni cāṅgani nāṭakādiṣu sambhavantyapi vīthyāmavaśyaṃ vidheyāni spaṣṭatayā nāṭakādiṣu viniviṣṭānyapīhodāhṛtāni /
GK16visa06cu:4978: aṅgī hāsyarasastatra vīthyaṅgānāṃ sthitirna vā // VisSd_6.265 //
GK16visa06cu:4983: āśritya kañcana janaṃ saṃkīrṇamiti tadviduḥ // VisSd_6.266 //
GK16visa06cu:4994: idaṃ tu saṅkīrṇenaiva gatārthamiti muninā pṛthaṅnoktam /
GK16visa06cu:4996: tatra nāṭikā kḷptavṛttā syāt strīprāyā caturaṅkikā /
GK16visa06cu:5002: pade pade mānavatī tadvaśaḥ saṅgamo dvayoḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5003: vṛttiḥ syātkauśikī svalpavimarśāḥ sandhayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.272 //
GK16visa06cu:5008: troṭakaṃ nāma tatprāhuḥ pratyaṅkaṃ savidūṣakam // VisSd_6.273 //
GK16visa06cu:5020: na ca viṣkambhako 'pyatra pracuraścādbhuto rasaḥ // VisSd_6.276 //
GK16visa06cu:5038: dāsī ca nāyikā vṛttiḥ kauśikī bhāratī tathā // VisSd_6.280 //
GK16visa06cu:5046: catastro nāyikāstatra trayo 'ṅkā iti kecana // VisSd_6.283 //
GK16visa06cu:5058: netā strī cāpyudāttātra sandhī ādyo tathāntimaḥ // VisSd_6.285 //
GK16visa06cu:5068: nepathye gīyate nāndī tathā tatra prarocanā // VisSd_6.287 //
GK16visa06cu:5077: hīnairbhāṣyā vibhāṣā syāt sā ca saptavidhā smṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:5078: prācyāvantī māgadhī ca śākārī ca tathāparā /
GK16visa06cu:5079: cāṇḍālī śāvarī caiva tathā bhīrīti bhedataḥ //
GK16visa06cu:5090: na tatra vṛttirbhavati bhāratī na ca kauśikī // VisSd_6.292 //
GK16visa06cu:5111: aśāntahāsyāśca rasā nāyako brāhmaṇo mataḥ // VisSd_6.296 //
GK16visa06cu:5133: svalpavṛttā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //
GK16visa06cu:5171: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5185: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso vibodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //
GK16visa06cu:5189: bhrāntināśo vibodhaḥ syānmithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //
GK16visa06cu:5195: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāṭakaprakṛtitve 'pi yathaicityaṃ yathālābhaṃ nāṭakoktaviśeṣaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5196: yatra ca nāṭakoktasyāpi punarupādānaṃ tatra tatsadbhāvasya niyamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5213: taduktavastuno yacca punarupādānaṃ nāṭakāntara iti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:5225: dvābhyāṃ tu yugmakaṃ sāṃdānatikaṃ tribhiriṣyate // VisSd_6.314 //
GK16visa06cu:5232: “sāndrānandamanantamavyayamajaṃ yadyogino 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkartumupāsate prati muhurdhyānaikatānāḥ param /
GK16visa06cu:5237_0: (vi, ṭa) sāndrānandamiti--yatparaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ brahma kṣaṇamapi sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā
GK16visa06cu:5237_1: dhyānamātrāviṣṭā yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5247: (vi, ṭha) māninyā mānabhaṅgaprakāraṃ sakhyau kathayannāha--kiṃ karoṣītyādi /
GK16visa06cu:5248: he kānte / karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ?
GK16visa06cu:5250: kuraṅgākṣīmiti vaktuṃ vayaṃ yāvadīhāmahe tāvanmadhuro madhupadhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt /
GK16visa06cu:5251: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
GK16visa06cu:5258: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
GK16visa06cu:5260: ekavaṃśabhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
GK16visa06cu:5262: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭakasandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
GK16visa06cu:5272: catvārastasya vargāḥ syusteṣvekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
GK16visa06cu:5274: kvacinnindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
GK16visa06cu:5276: nāstisvalpā nātidīrghāḥ sargā aṣṭādhikā iha // VisSd_6.320 //
GK16visa06cu:5278: sargānte bhāvisargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.321 //
GK16visa06cu:5284: kavervṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasyetarasya vā // VisSd_6.324 //
GK16visa06cu:5288: (vi, ṇa) catvāra iti---dharmārthakāmamokṣā ye catvāro vargāsteṣvekamapi tatphalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5291: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5303: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5311: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
GK16visa06cu:5326: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5368: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //
GK16visa06cu:5394: (vi, bha) samarakaṇḍuleti--samarotsāhena kaṇḍule nibiḍe dṛḍhe bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ yena /
GK16visa06cu:5402: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt,
GK16visa06cu:5404: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
GK16visa06cu:5406: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
GK16visa06cu:5418: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
GK16visa06cu:5430: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5434: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa06cu:5442: (vi, ra) “ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad “āpitu“--ityādidaṇḍyācāryavacanādayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5472: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
